# Prerequisites

Readers do not need to have any experience with **rvest**, CSS, HTML, XML, JavaScript, Selenium, or any other web technologies. A full introduction to all of these languages will be provided in the text. A few toy examples will be presented throughout the introductory material which will serve as motivation for the case studies portion of the book.

For more information on any of the following materials, pleas see the following links:

**CSS tutorial**: <https://www.w3schools.com/css/> 

**HTML tutorial**: <https://www.w3schools.com/html/>

**XML tutorial**: <https://www.w3schools.com/xml/>

**rvest vignette**: <https://stat4701.github.io/edav/2015/04/02/rvest_tutorial/>

**JavaScript tutorial**: <https://www.w3schools.com/js/>

**jQuery tutorial**: <https://www.w3schools.com/jquery/>

**Selenium**, and specifically **RSelenium**, will be covered in Part II of this book. No tutorial will be provided at this time - this book will serve as the tutorial for **RSelenium**.
